q: people. Remember when Sen. Bernie Sanders Boehner promised a 100 Billion in spending cuts just in the first year if they won in Nov. 2010. Here is the actual quote from their`` Pledge to America''. With common-sense exceptions for seniors, veterans, and our troops, we will roll back government spending to prestimulus, pre-bailout levels, saving us at least$ 100 billion in the first year alone and putting us on a path to begin paying down the debt, balancing the budget, and ending the spending spree in Washington that threatens our children's future . Answering one of only a couple of audience questions, Donald Rumsfeld said of the difference between the Iraq War and Vietnam: The Vietnamese were not likely to come and attack the United States of America. Yet the CIA reported in October 2002 that it was unlikely that Iraq would launch any type of chemical or biological attack against America- unless we provoked the regime by attacking them. Indeed,
